snippet: The possibility was raised in a French case at a time when experts have come to believe that sexual transmission is an important driver of the virus.
abstract: Scientists, in letter to New England Journal of Medicine, suggest French case of Zika virus shows possibility infection can be transmitted through oral sex.
lead_paragraph: The possibility was raised in a French case at a time when experts have come to believe that sexual transmission is an important driver of the virus.

headline.main: Zika May Be Transmitted by Oral Sex, Scientists Find
headline.print_headline: Case Suggests Zika’s Spread by Oral Sex
